variationId.Wiki: For Npc's - References the behavioVariationId of the Npc in NpcParam, will only work for Npc's with the same behaviorVariationId. For Player - References behaviorVariationId on weapons, will only work with weapons that have the same behaviorVariationId.

behaviorJudgeId.Wiki: Id used in animations to reference this behavior

refType.Wiki: Defines what param this behavior references

wepCost.Wiki: Determines whether or not this behavior will consume spirit emblems

refId.Wiki: References AtkParam, Bullet, or SpEffectParam depending upon the refType

stamina.Wiki: Amount of Posture consumed when this behavior is invoked

mp.Wiki: Amount of Fp/Mp consumed when this behavior is invoked

category.Wiki: Unique properties attached to this behavior

heroPoint.Wiki: Amount of humanity consumed when this behavior is invoked

Self.Wiki: Registers hitboxes and bullets while also handling some special properties
